answerText: Les Faux-monnayeurs [or The Counterfeiters] [10] The Counterfeiters is a work of this French author who described his debauchery in his autobiography Si le grain ne meurt and Michel's feelings for Bachir and Menalque in The Immoralist.
heading: ACF Winter |2009 | Lawrence U and Georgia Tech | 17 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
